message.content:
You are QA Agent #9 for Sprint 10i: Integration & Polish (Final Phase 10 Sprint)

## Worktree
Path: /Users/randlee/Documents/github/claude-history-worktrees/feature/phase10-integration
Branch: feature/phase10-integration

## What Was Implemented
Dev Agent #9 completed:
1. Created `pkg/export/integration_test.go` (866 lines) with comprehensive integration tests
2. Verified all Phase 10 components are integrated (Sprints 10a-10h)
3. Commit: 752dc95

## QA Checklist (MANDATORY - All Must Pass)

### 1. Test Suite Verification
```bash
cd /Users/randlee/Documents/github/claude-history-worktrees/feature/phase10-integration/src
go test ./... -v
```
- [ ] 100% test pass rate (ZERO failures)
- [ ] All test packages pass

### 2. Coverage Check
```bash
go test ./pkg/export/... -cover
```
- [ ] Coverage >85% on export package (Dev reported 93.4%)

### 3. Linter Check
```bash
golangci-lint run ./...
```
- [ ] Zero linter errors
- [ ] Zero linter warnings (or acceptable ones)

### 4. Integration Test Review
Review `pkg/export/integration_test.go`:
- [ ] Tests cover all Sprint features (10a-10h)
- [ ] Tests verify CSS, JS, and HTML integration
- [ ] Tests cover edge cases (large sessions, empty, special chars)
- [ ] Tests verify accessibility features
- [ ] Tests verify print stylesheet

### 5. Code Quality Check
- [ ] No debug statements left in code
- [ ] No commented-out code
- [ ] Proper error handling
- [ ] Clean commit history

## QA Result Format
Report your findings as:
```
QA Sprint 10i Result: PASS ✅ or FAIL ❌

Test Results:
- Total tests: X
- Passed: X
- Failed: X
- Coverage: X%

Linter: X issues

Issues Found (if any):
1. ...

Recommendation: Ready for PR / Needs fixes
```

If FAIL: List specific issues that need fixing.
If PASS: Confirm ready for PR creation.

input.command: cd /Users/randlee/Documents/github/claude-history-worktrees/feature/phase10-integration/src && ./claude-history export --help 2>&1 || go build -o claude-history . && ./claude-history export --help 2>&1

content.content:
(eval):1: no such file or directory: ./claude-history
Export a Claude Code session to a shareable format.

HTML format creates a standalone folder with:
- index.html: Main conversation view
- agents/*.html: Lazy-loaded subagent content
- source/*.jsonl: Original session files for resurrection
- manifest.json: Metadata and tree structure
- style.css, script.js: Static assets

JSONL format copies only the source files.

Examples:
  # Export to HTML (default format)
  claude-history export /path/to/project --session abc123

  # Export to specific folder
  claude-history export /path/to/project --session abc123 --output ./my-export/

  # Export just JSONL (smaller, for backup/restore)
  claude-history export /path/to/project --session abc123 --format jsonl

Usage:
  claude-history export [project-path] [flags]

Flags:
  -f, --format string    Export format: html or jsonl (default "html")
  -h, --help             help for export
  -o, --output string    Output directory (auto-generated if not specified)
  -s, --session string   Session ID (required)

Global Flags:
      --claude-dir string   Custom ~/.claude directory location

content.text: Excellent! The CLI is working properly. Let me do a final summary check.

content.text:
---

## QA Sprint 10i Result: PASS

### Test Results:
- **Total test cases**: 638 (including sub-tests)
- **Passed**: 637
- **Failed**: 0
- **Skipped**: 1 (TestExport_WindowsPaths - expected, platform-specific)
- **Export package coverage**: 93.4%

### Linter Results:
- **golangci-lint**: 0 issues
- **go vet**: 0 issues

### Integration Test Review:
The integration tests in `/Users/randlee/Documents/github/claude-history-worktrees/feature/phase10-integration/src/pkg/export/integration_test.go` (866 lines) comprehensively cover:

1. **Sprint 10a (CSS Variable System)**: `CSSVariableSystem` subtest verifies CSS file reference
2. **Sprint 10b (Chat Bubble Layout)**: `ChatBubbleLayout` subtest verifies message-row, message-bubble, avatar classes
3. **Sprint 10c (Copy-to-Clipboard)**: `CopyToClipboard` subtest verifies clipboard.js, copy-btn, data-copy-text
4. **Sprint 10d (Tool Call Overlays)**: `ToolCallOverlays` subtest verifies tool-call, tool-header classes
5. **Sprint 10e (Syntax Highlighting)**: `SyntaxHighlighting` subtest verifies code-block rendering
6. **Sprint 10f (Deep Dive Navigation)**: `DeepDiveNavigation` subtest verifies navigation.js, breadcrumbs, ARIA labels
7. **Sprint 10g (Interactive Controls)**: `InteractiveControls` subtest verifies controls.js, expand/collapse, search-box
8. **Sprint 10h (Header/Footer)**: `HeaderFooterMetadata` subtest verifies page-header, page-footer, session-metadata

Additional integration tests cover:
- Accessibility (ARIA roles, labels, aria-live)
- XSS prevention (HTML escaping)
- Large conversation performance (1000 entries < 5 seconds)
- Empty conversation handling
- Special characters (Unicode, emoji)
- All entry types rendering
- Agent resurrection workflow (copy agent ID)
- Print styles and responsive CSS
- JavaScript module completeness
- Script load order
- Color contrast variables

### Code Quality:
- No debug statements (fmt.Print, log.Print) in production code
- Comments are descriptive and appropriate
- Proper error handling throughout
- Clean commit: `752dc95 feat(export): integration & polish (Sprint 10i)`

### Recommendation: **Ready for PR**

All mandatory QA checks pass. The integration tests comprehensively verify all Phase 10 sprints (10a-10h) are properly integrated. The export package has 93.4% coverage exceeding the 85% target. No linter issues or build errors.
